Instrument.name: Framing Camera 2 (FC2) for Dawn
Instrument.description: The Framing Camera (FC) was a multispectral CCD imager in a refracting telescope that also served as optical navigation camera for the NASA Dawn mission to the asteroids 4 Vesta and 1 Ceres. The camera consisted of two identical units, FC1 and FC2, which were mounted side-by-side on the +Z deck of the spacecraft. FC1 and FC2 each had a 1024x1024 pixel CCD, and filters includef one broadband and seven narrow-band filters from 438-965 nm.
